channel.title: [508] Option Select
channel.description: Hey. I was wondering how to make it do something when I click an option on the Select Option Box. I would be able to figure it out easy, if it printed a problem. But it does nothing, just closes the interface. It doesn't state it's an unhandled button or anything like that.

item.title: [508] Option Select
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Hey. I was wondering how to make it do something when I click an option on the Select Option Box. I would be able to figure it out easy, if it printed a problem. But it does nothing, just closes the interface. It doesn’t state it’s an unhandled button or anything like that.

Read full topic
